title: GlycoRDF
content: GlycoRDF is a standard representation for Glycosmis data (glycan structures, publication information, biological source information, experimental data) in RDF.

title: GlycoCo0
content: GlycoCo0 is a standard ontology for glycoconjugate  data (glycoprotein/glycolipid structures, publication information, biological source information, experimental data).

title: GGDonto
content: Ontology od genetic diseases known to be related to Glycan Metabolism.

title: PAConto
content: RDF representation of PACDB data and ontology of Infectious Diseases known to be related to Glycan Binding.
